channel.title: Help with ham please!
channel.description:
me and my friend were on mopar scape the server crashed"boohoo"it was a server that didint need ham by the way.so we went to the advertisment page"here we go again"and more then half of them are ham servers"ffs!"so i was like"wtf lets go get ze hamachi :|"(ze=the...lol)so went to the site downloaded,installed, then i saw a hamachi server "yay"it was online "yaaay"so before i even loaded moparscape i put in the network name and pass and clicked enter.it was online again"yay!"then opened up moparscape(online cleint thing 1) and clicked enter then put ip then user name and pass login and....the...message appeared... :eek:"server must be down 1"
what did i do wrong???? :|

item.title: Help with ham please!
item.dc:creator: @mmmmmm mmmmmm
item.description:
@mmmmmm wrote:

well you have to click that beside the “Login” button then enter the ip and then log in =]

Read full topic

item.title: Help with ham please!
item.dc:creator: @mmmmmm mmmmmm
item.description:
@mmmmmm wrote:

did you ever click the “Start Server” button?

Read full topic
